message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $175. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $120, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $155. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. Would you be willing to go down to $130?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to go a bit further, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $130. How about we meet at $140? It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still looking for a better deal. Would you be willing to go down to $135?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to go a bit further, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $135. How about we meet at $142.50? It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price!
